attributes.action: Make laws regarding use by dates on food products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If retailers have products one or two days from the sell by date, instead of disposing these foods, they could be legaly required to otherwise. this could mean a permanent trade relationship with organisations such as homeless shelters where the retailers must offer these goods at a maximim of the cost to the retailer that specific product cost. this also encourages retailers to be more responsible over waste
